data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Lucknow.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 50,488 believers in the county of Lucknow to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Rajput Chandel people might believe through him.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 50,488 believers in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Lucknow, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

location.name: Lucknow
location.people_groups_list: Boria, Bari (Muslim traditions), Balahar (Muslim traditions), Bania Ummad, Brahmin Kanaujia
